options.content:
- Use Cases: This dashboard can be used to track community growth by OSS maintainers.
- Data Source Required: GitHub users' organizations are used to filter issues/PRs created by certain users. [Publicize users' org](https://docs.github.com/en/account-and-profile/setting-up-and-managing-your-personal-account-on-github/managing-your-membership-in-organizations/publicizing-or-hiding-organization-membership) so that Apache DevLake can collect users' org.
- This dashboard **DOES NOT** honor the time filter on the top-right corner.

panels.title: Dashboard Introduction
Community Issues

targets.rawSql:
select
  count(distinct i.id)
from
  issues as i
  join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
  join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
where
  i.type in (${issue_type})
  and date(i.created_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY
  and b.id in (${repo_id})

panels.title: New Issue Count [Previous Week]

targets.rawSql:
select
  count(distinct i.id)
from
  issues as i
  join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
  join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
where
  i.type in (${issue_type})
  and date(i.created_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY
  and b.id in (${repo_id})
  and i.creator_id not in (select distinct id from accounts where organization in (${org}))

panels.title: New Issue Created by Community [Previous Week]

targets.rawSql:
select
  sum(case when i.creator_id not in (select distinct id from accounts where organization in (${org})
    ) then 1 else 0 end)/count(distinct i.id) as community_issue_ratio
from
  issues as i
  join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
  join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
where
  i.type in (${issue_type})
  and date(i.created_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY
  and b.id in (${repo_id})

panels.title: Ratio of New Issue Created by the Community [Previous Week]

targets.rawSql:
select
  distinct i.creator_name
from
  issues as i
  join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
  join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
where
  i.type in (${issue_type})
  and date(i.created_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY
  and b.id in (${repo_id})
  and i.creator_name not in (select distinct creator_name from issues where created_date < curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY and creator_name is not null)

panels.title: 1st Time Issue Reporter [Previous Week]

targets.rawSql:
with issue_comment_list as(
  select
    i.id as issue_id,
    i.url,
    i.title,
    ic.id as comment_id,
    ic.created_date as comment_date,
    ic.body,
    case when ic.id is not null then rank() over (partition by i.id order by ic.created_date asc) else null end as comment_rank
  from
    issues i
    join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
    join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
    left join issue_comments ic on i.id = ic.issue_id
  where
    i.type in (${issue_type})
    and date(i.created_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY
    and b.id in (${repo_id})
    and i.creator_id not in (select distinct id from accounts where organization in (${org}))
)

select
  1 - count(distinct case when comment_id is null then issue_id else null end)/count(distinct issue_id) as response_rate
from issue_comment_list

panels.title: Community Issues' Response Rate [Previous Week]

targets.rawSql:
with issue_comment_list as(
  select
    i.id as issue_id,
    i.url,
    i.issue_key,
    i.title,
    i.creator_name,
    i.created_date as issue_created_date,
    i.status,
    ic.id as comment_id,
    ic.created_date as comment_date,
    ic.body,
    case when ic.id is not null then rank() over (partition by i.id order by ic.created_date asc) else null end as comment_rank
  from
    issues i
    join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
    join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
    left join issue_comments ic on i.id = ic.issue_id
  where
    i.type in (${issue_type})
    and date(i.created_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY
    and b.id in (${repo_id})
    and i.creator_id not in (select distinct id from accounts where organization in (${org}))
)

select 
  issue_key,
  title,
  creator_name,
  issue_created_date,
  status,
  (TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,issue_created_date,NOW()))/1440 as 'queue_time_in_days',
  url
from issue_comment_list
where comment_id is null

panels.title: List of New Community Issues with no Comments [Previous Week]

targets.rawSql:
with issue_comment_list as(
  select
    i.id as issue_id,
    i.url,
    i.title,
    i.created_date as issue_created_date,
    ic.id as comment_id,
    ic.created_date as comment_date,
    ic.body,
    case when ic.id is not null then rank() over (partition by i.id order by ic.created_date asc) else null end as comment_rank
  from
    issues i
    join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
    join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
    left join issue_comments ic on i.id = ic.issue_id
  where
    i.type in (${issue_type})
    and date(i.created_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY
    and b.id in (${repo_id})
    and i.creator_id not in (select distinct id from accounts where organization in (${org}))
)

select
  avg((TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, issue_created_date,comment_date))/1440)
from issue_comment_list
where comment_rank = 1

panels.title: New Community Issues' Average Response Time in Days [Previous Week]

targets.rawSql:
with issue_comment_list as(
  select
    SUBSTRING_INDEX(i.url, '/', -1) as issue_number,
    i.url,
    i.issue_key,
    i.title,
    i.creator_name,
    i.created_date as issue_created_date,
    ic.id as comment_id,
    ic.created_date as comment_date,
    ic.body,
    case when ic.id is not null then rank() over (partition by i.id order by ic.created_date asc) else null end as comment_rank
  from
    issues i
    join board_issues bi on i.id = bi.issue_id
    join boards b on bi.board_id = b.id
    left join issue_comments ic on i.id = ic.issue_id
  where
    i.type in (${issue_type})
    and date(i.created_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY
    and b.id in (${repo_id})
    and i.creator_id not in (select distinct id from accounts where organization in (${org}))
)

select
  issue_key,
  title,
  -- body,
  creator_name,
  issue_created_date,
  comment_date,
  (TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, issue_created_date,comment_date))/1440 as response_time_in_days,
  url
from issue_comment_list
where comment_rank = 1

panels.title: List of New Community Issues' 1st Comment [Previous Week]
Community PRs

targets.rawSql:
select
	count(distinct pr.id) as pull_request_count
from 
	pull_requests pr
where
  date(created_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY
	and base_repo_id in (${repo_id})

panels.title: Number of New Pull Requests [Previous Week]

targets.rawSql:
select
	count(distinct pr.id) as pull_request_count
from 
	pull_requests pr
where
  date(created_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY
	and base_repo_id in (${repo_id})
	and author_id not in (select distinct id from accounts where organization in (${org}))

panels.title: Number of New Pull Requests Created by the Community [Previous Week]

targets.rawSql:
select
  sum(case when author_id not in (select distinct id from accounts where organization in (${org}))
  then 1 else 0 end)/count(distinct pr.id) as community_pr_ratio
from
  pull_requests pr
where
  date(created_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY
	and base_repo_id in (${repo_id})

panels.title: Ratio of New PR Created by the Community [Previous Week]

targets.rawSql:
select
	count(distinct pr.id) as merged_pull_request_count
from 
	pull_requests pr
where
  date(created_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY
	and base_repo_id in (${repo_id})
	and merged_date is not null
	and author_id not in (select distinct id from accounts where organization in (${org}))

panels.title: Number of Merged Pull Requests Created by the Community [Previous Week]

targets.rawSql:
select
	avg(TIMESTAMPDIFF(Minute,created_date,merged_date)/1440)
from 
	pull_requests
where 
  date(created_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY
	and base_repo_id in (${repo_id})
	and merged_date is not null
	and author_id not in (select distinct id from accounts where organization in (${org}))

panels.title: Average Time to Merge of Community Pull Requests in Days [Previous Week]

panels.description: Contributors: the PR authors who have merged PR(s)

targets.rawSql:
select
  distinct author_name
from 
	pull_requests pr
where
  date(created_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY
	and merged_date is not null
	and base_repo_id in (${repo_id})
	and author_name not in (select distinct author_name from pull_requests where created_date < curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY and author_name is not null)

panels.title: First time Contributor [Previous Week]

targets.rawSql:
select
	count(distinct case when merged_date is not null then pr.id else null end)/ count(distinct pr.id) as merged_pull_request_ratio
from 
	pull_requests pr
where
  date(created_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY
	and base_repo_id in (${repo_id})
	and author_id not in (select distinct id from accounts where organization in (${org}))

panels.title: Ratio of Merged Pull Requests Created by the Community [Previous Week]

targets.rawSql:
select
  pull_request_key,
  title,
  status,
  author_name,
  created_date,
  (TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, created_date,curdate()))/1440 as queue_time_in_days,
  url
from 
	pull_requests pr
where
  date(created_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY
	and base_repo_id in (${repo_id})
	and merged_date is null
  and author_id not in (select distinct id from accounts where organization in (${org}))

panels.title: List of New Community Issues' 1st Comment [Previous Week]

targets.rawSql:
select
  author_name,
	count(distinct pr.id) as pull_request_count
from 
	pull_requests pr
where
  date(created_date) BETWEEN curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate())+7 DAY AND curdate() - INTERVAL WEEKDAY(curdate()) DAY
	and base_repo_id in (${repo_id})
	and merged_date is not NULL
	and author_id not in (select distinct id from accounts where organization in (${org}))
group by 1
order by 2 desc
limit 20

panels.title: Top 20 Community Contributors By Number of PRs Merged [Previous Week]

targets.rawSql:
select
	count(distinct author_id) as all_contributor_count
from 
	pull_requests pr
where
	base_repo_id in (${repo_id})
	and merged_date is not null
	-- and author_id not in (select distinct id from accounts where organization in (${org}))

panels.title: Top Community Contributors By PRs Created [All History]

targets.rawSql:
select
  author_name,
	count(distinct pr.id) as merged_pull_request_count
from 
	pull_requests pr
where
	base_repo_id in (${repo_id})
	and merged_date is not NULL
	-- and author_id not in (select distinct id from accounts where organization in (${org}))
group by 1
order by 2 desc
limit 20

panels.title: Top 20 Community Contributors By Merged PR Numbers [All History]

options.content: This dashboard is created based on this [data schema](https://devlake.apache.org/docs/DataModels/DevLakeDomainLayerSchema). Want to add more metrics? Please follow the [guide](https://devlake.apache.org/docs/Configuration/Dashboards/GrafanaUserGuide).

list.definition: select concat(name, '-', id) as text from repos
list.label: Repo
list.name: repo_id
list.query: select concat(name, '-', id) as text from repos

list.definition: select distinct organization from accounts where organization != ''
list.label: Community Definition - Issues and PRs NOT from Organization(s)
list.name: org
list.query: select distinct organization from accounts where organization != ''
